newsitem.title: PERU: Southern Peru Ltd in talks with Belgium's Powerfin.
newsitem.headline: Southern Peru Ltd in talks with Belgium's Powerfin.

text.p: Copper miner Southern Peru Ltd has begun negotiations to sell to Belgium's Powerfin its system of electricity generating plants at its smelter in Ilo in the south of Peru, the Lima stock exchange said Wednesday.

The two companies hope to conclude the sale in February, the exchange said in its daily report. The sale would not reduce the total value of Southern's assets by more than 15 percent, the report added.
The mining company has an installed electricity generating capacity at Ilo of 182 megawatts (MW).
Belgium's Tractebel owns Powerfin, according to officials at Southern Peru.
Majority owned by ASARCO Inc and Peru's largest copper producer, Southern accounts for about 60 percent of Peru's total mined copper output.
